content.rendered:
Hello and welcome to week 3 of This Week in Genesis. Let’s get to it…

Themes

  • Imagine, a beautiful new blog theme, was released by the super talented Susan Nelson at Oh Hello Designs
  • Ludwig was released by the hard working Ryan Townley over at Minimal Genesis
  • Concise, a super clean Genesis child theme, was released by Calvin Makes
  • Brian Gardner gave us a further peek of his new Expedition Pro theme (Genesis Facebook group membership required to view link, but you can register for free)

Showcase

  • Brian Gardner (him, again) shared this gorgeous site based on StudioPress’ Modern Portfolio theme (if you’re the developer of the site and want a shout out let me know): storylineconference.com
  • Shaan Nicol, launches a new site for the Comedy Channel in Australia: thecomedychannel.com.au

Articles

  • Carrie Dils put together a fascinating article exploring is there a market for premium Genesis themes?
  • Sridhar Katakam shared a video of how he answers StudioPress forum posts (so now you have no excuse!), plus his local WordPress development process for all your developer types
  • In case you missed it, Genesis rockstar Calvin Makes did an awesome interview with this very website, talking about lessons learned from launching premium themes, plus he threw in a little theme giveaway too.

Podcasts

  • OfficeHours.fm rocked out a great episode this week with one of the nicest guys in WordPress / Genesis, Mr WordPress Training aka Bob Dunn (aka BobWP) in episode 58
  • The UK Genesis Podcast spoke with James Roberts, about freelancing and his Genesis theme shop

That’s it for this week. As ever, I’d love to hear your thoughts or shout outs in the comments below or you can hit me up on Twitter @nickcdavis.

And finally, thanks to everyone who has shared (and keeps sharing) these articles, I really appreciate it.

Have an awesome weekend.

PS The competition to win two awesome Genesis child themes from Calvin closes on Monday. So if you didn’t already enter, what are you waiting for?

PPS Next week I have an amazing interview with Sridhar Katakam (yes, that guy with the awesome Genesis code tutorials website) to share with you in which he talks about how he got into Genesis, the success of his membership site and his plans for the future. Want to know when it goes live? Subscribe 🙂

excerpt.rendered: Three beautiful new Genesis themes are released, you impress everybody again in the showcase, plus is there a market for premium Genesis themes?
